ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Rod of Insidious Glamour
ygData.msgSnippet: Since we are on the subject of items, could anyone tell me where exactly is the froglock priest in guk is that drops the Golden Rod ? Ayliala Nabullia 36
ygData.messageBody:
Since we are on the subject of items, could anyone tell me where exactly is
the froglock priest in guk is that drops the Golden Rod ?

Ayliala Nabullia
36 Enchantress
Mith. Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Treadway, Donald <dtreadway@...>
To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, April 03, 2000 9:51 AM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Rod of Insidious Glamour


> Got mine off the ones in Innothule, right after getting the rod. Took
about
> 6 kills I think, so maybe I just got lucky.
>
> > ----------
> > From: Douglas S. Reilly[SMTP:dreilly@...]
> > Reply To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
> > Sent: Monday, April 03, 2000 12:23 PM
> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Rod of Insidious Glamour
> >
> > As far as I know, you can get them off of any Shadowed Men. I was able
to
> > get
> > mine off of one in Lesser Fay. The only drawback that I found was that
it
> > took
> > FOREVER for one to drop.
> >
> > Best of luck =)
> >
> > Horchata Sabrosa
> > <Art of War>
> > Brell
